text: Ìkéde kan láti ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu àti Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀ sí àwọn ènìyàn ní ọjọ́ Hajj Ńlá ni pé, “Dájúdájú Allāhu yọwọ́yọsẹ̀ (nínú ọ̀rọ̀) àwọn ọ̀ṣẹbọ. Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀ náà (yọwọ́yọsẹ̀). Tí ẹ bá ronú pìwàdà, ó sì lóore jùlọ fun yín. Tí ẹ bá gbúnrí, ẹ mọ̀ pé dájúdájú ẹ ò lè móríbọ́ nínú (ìyà) Allāhu.” Kí o sì fún àwọn t’ó ṣàì gbàgbọ́ ní ìró ìyà ẹlẹ́ta-eléro
